name: has-code-block
description: Check if a string at a specified path contains code blocks (``` delimited)

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'data.content')

output.description: true if string contains code blocks (```), false if no code blocks, path doesn't exist, or value is not a string

examples.description: String with code block returns true
String with multiple code blocks returns true
String without code blocks returns false
